CS:GO (Counter Strike Global Offensive) is a free to play FPS to play with your friends, although if you are looking to play the competitive side of CS:GO free to play is not a option with the vast amount of hackers you will encounter. Overall it's a great game with flaws but I'm sure that the developers will do their part to up the players experience.
